Author: captainmycaptainkirk
Text: honestly... like im not being overdramatic but I literally think someone slipped something into my drink because Ive been blackout drunk.... and that.... was not it....

Author: vanillabake
Text: Stay safe :/ I understand sometimes it’s so hard not to drink. The last time I drank, I got blackout drunk and puked so much. I lost weight but I felt so awful after. I drank to deal with trauma. Did not help at all.  Take care of yourself and I know it’s the last thing you want to hear but I’d cut back on the alcohol :(
